stocks.impact_theory: Netflix drops out of bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery after Paramount's superior $31/share offer, securing a $2.8B breakup fee. Economic implications: frees up capital for buybacks and $20B content spend, avoiding integration risks/debt. Market psychology: relief rally as investors feared dilution/deal risks; FOMO on cash-rich position. Historical parallels: AOL-Time Warner merger disaster. Analogies: dodging a sinking ship to sail solo; like breaking off a bad date with a hefty consolation prize.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: X sentiment highly positive with posts celebrating fee and competitive edge vs PARA/WBD; premarket +7%, web news highlights capital discipline. Strong volume and breakout above key resistance.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long calls or shares for 10-15% upside on momentum/fee deployment; target $100.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Hot PPI data pressures growth stocks; renewed M&A interest.

stocks.justification: Clear catalyst with positive X/news alignment, historical relief rallies post-deal breaks.

stocks.impact_theory: Jack Dorsey announces 40% layoffs (4K jobs) citing AI tools enabling smaller teams/higher output (+40% engineer productivity). Economic: massive cost savings boost margins amid rising profits. Psych: validates AI as efficiency driver, precedent for tech. Parallels: Twitter 80% cuts post-Musk. Analogies: upgrading from horse-drawn cart to engine; pruning tree for better fruit.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Stock +19% premarket; X buzzing positively on AI trend/Dorsey boldness, despite some backlash; earnings beat with raised guidance.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 20%+ on AI narrative; target $80.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Execution risks, employee morale, regulatory scrutiny on layoffs.

stocks.justification: Market rewarding cost discipline; strong X engagement.

stocks.impact_theory: Paramount wins with enhanced $30-31/share all-cash offer (superior to Netflix); deal expected Q4 2026. Econ: synergies in content/streaming, deleveraging. Psych: premium validates value, end to uncertainty. Parallels: AT&T-Time Warner. Analogies: merging two studios like Avengers team-up; selling undervalued gem.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Trading near $31 bid; positive X mentions in PARA context; regulatory progress noted.

stocks.impact_theory: Paramount Skydance clinches WBD after Netflix bows out. Econ: massive content bolt-on, scale vs streamers. Psych: victory rally, strategic win. Parallels: Viacom-CBS merger. Analogies: winning auction for prized art; consolidating fragmented media.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Bidding war win; X posts highlight triumph; staff concerns but market focuses upside.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4/FY2026 beat ($215B rev +65%), but sinks 5% on AI capex sustainability fears, high purchase obligations ($95B). Econ: growth intact but ROI questions. Psych: profit-taking after run-up. Parallels: 2022 chip downturn. Analogies: balloon deflating post-peak; feast to famine cycle.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: X concerns on capex/FCF; tech selloff leader despite beat.
